name: Product Ecosystem by CO2 AI
summary: CO2 AI is the leading Sustainability-as-a-Service enterprise platform, helping the world’s largest companies manage their net zero journey and to decarbonize at scale. We have an exclusive partnership with CDP to build the reference platform for product-level Scope 3 data sharing. This “Product Ecosystem” empowers organizations to seamlessly collaborate with suppliers on product-level emissions data to measure, manage, and reduce their Scope 3 emissions at scale.
